instruction.value: Administer partial doses into appropriate multiple injection sites.

AdditionalNotes.value: Post-stroke spasticity of upper limb: flexed wrist.

Post-stroke spasticity of upper limb: flexed elbow.
Post-stroke spasticity of upper limb: pronated forearm.
